mapper.insert:
insert into standard_unit( id, name, sale_price, market_price, demo_sale_price, competing_sale_price, jd_profit )values
( #{po.id}, #{po.name}, #{po.salePrice}, #{po.marketPrice}, #{po.demoSalePrice}, #{po.competingSalePrice}, #{po.jdProfit} )
on duplicate key update name=VALUES (name), sale_price=VALUES (sale_price), market_price=VALUES (market_price), demo_sale_price=VALUES (demo_sale_price), competing_sale_price=VALUES (competing_sale_price), jd_profit=VALUES (jd_profit)

INSERT INTO standard_unit(
id,
merchant_product_serial_number,
merchant_id,
standard_product_unit_id,
merchant_cate_tree_node_id,
product_category,
merchant_series_id,
name,
alias,
is_visible,
subtitle,
supplier_id,
type,
remark,

return_days,

is_vip_card,
is_enable_shelfLife,
shelfLife_days,
is_vendible,
gross_weight,
net_weight,
code,
merchant_brand_id,
market_price,
promotion_price,
status,
sale_way,
sold_base,
freight_explain,
shipments_explain,
freight_template_id,
create_time,
update_time,

enterprise_id,
stock_warning,
create_userid,
create_username,
create_userip,

update_userid,
update_username,
update_userip,
update_usermac,
is_spu_keyword,
demo_sale_price,
competing_sale_price,
store_id,
presell_period,
relevance_su_id,
buy_type,
front_serial_number,
) VALUES (
#{id},
#{merchantProductSerialNumber},
#{merchantId},
#{standardProductUnitId},
#{merchantCateTreeNodeId},
#{productCategory},
#{merchantSeriesId},
#{name},

#{isVisible},

#{salePrice},
#{saleTaxRate},
#{returnDays},

)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
UPDATE standard_unit
merchant_product_serial_number = #{merchantProductSerialNumber},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
standard_product_unit_id = #{standardProductUnitId},
merchant_cate_tree_node_id = #{merchantCateTreeNodeId},
product_category = #{productCategory},
merchant_series_id = #{merchantSeriesId},
name = #{name},
alias = #{alias},
is_visible = #{isVisible},
subtitle = #{subtitle},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
type = #{type},
remark = #{remark},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
sale_tax_rate = #{saleTaxRate},
return_days = #{returnDays},
replacement_days = #{replacementDays},
guarantee_days = #{guaranteeDays},
is_vat_invoice = #{isVatInvoice},
is_vip_card = #{isVipCard},
is_enable_shelfLife = #{isEnableShelflife},
shelfLife_days = #{shelflifeDays},
is_vendible = #{isVendible},
gross_weight = #{grossWeight},
net_weight = #{netWeight},
code = #{code},
merchant_brand_id = #{merchantBrandId},
market_price = #{marketPrice},
promotion_price = #{promotionPrice},
status = #{status},
sale_way = #{saleWay},
sold_base = #{soldBase},
freight_explain = #{freightExplain},
shipments_explain = #{shipmentsExplain},
freight_template_id = #{freightTemplateId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId},
stock_warning = #{stockWarning},
create_userid = #{createUserid},
create_username = #{createUsername},
create_userip = #{createUserip},
create_usermac = #{createUsermac},
update_userid = #{updateUserid},
update_username = #{updateUsername},
update_userip = #{updateUserip},
update_usermac = #{updateUsermac},
is_spu_keyword = #{isSpuKeyword},
demo_sale_price = #{demoSalePrice},
competing_sale_price = #{competingSalePrice},
store_id = #{storeId},
presell_period = #{presellPeriod},
relevance_su_id = #{relevanceSuId},
buy_type = #{buyType},
front_serial_number = #{frontSerialNumber}
WHERE id = #{id}

update.foreach: update standard_unit set sale_price =#{po.salePrice}, market_price=#{po.marketPrice}, demo_sale_price=#{po.demoSalePrice}, competing_sale_price=#{po.competingSalePrice}, status=#{po.status}, is_visible=#{po.isVisible}, jd_profit=#{po.jdProfit}

mapper.update: UPDATE commodity_product_unit as cpu,standard_unit as su,merchant_product as mp,product_unit as pu,sku as sku,jd_product as jp set su.sale_price=jp.price*#{standardCompanyRate}/100, su.demo_sale_price=jp.price*#{democompanysCompanyRate}/100, su.competing_sale_price=jp.price*#{competingCompanyRate}/100, cpu.sale_price=jp.price*#{standardCompanyRate}/100, cpu.demo_sale_price=jp.price*#{democompanysCompanyRate}/100, cpu.competing_sale_price=jp.price*#{competingCompanyRate}/100, mp.sale_price=jp.price*#{standardCompanyRate}/100, mp.demo_sale_price=jp.price*#{democompanysCompanyRate}/100, mp.competing_sale_price=jp.price*#{competingCompanyRate}/100, pu.sale_price=jp.price*#{standardCompanyRate}/100, pu.demo_sale_price=jp.price*#{democompanysCompanyRate}/100, pu.competing_sale_price=jp.price*#{competingCompanyRate}/100 WHERE cpu.product_unit_id=pu.id and cpu.standard_unit_id=su.id and cpu.standard_unit_id=mp.id and sku.id=cpu.sku_id and sku.external_sku_id=jp.id and sku.merchant_id=6

UPDATE standard_unit su,commodity_product_unit pu
su.is_visible = 1, su.status = 4, pu.status=4
WHERE su.merchant_id=6 AND pu.standard_unit_id=su.id

UPDATE standard_unit su,commodity_product_unit pu,jd_product jp,jd_product_inner_id jpii
su.is_visible = 0, su.status = 3, pu.status=3, jp.product_create_time = now()
WHERE su.merchant_id=6 AND
jpii.inner_pu_id=pu.id AND jp.id=jpii.jd_sku_id AND jpii.inner_su_id=su.id AND jp.profit>= #{profit} AND jp.product_create_time is not NULL
